nodes.text: Yan Pengu was a Rodian female who worked at the Star Cluster Casino on Nar Shaddaa. During a Soovada event, she determined that one of the guests was cheating. Pengu then asked a trusted associate to identify the cheater so that the bouncer Sellexith could kick them out.
Yan Pengu appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a Nightlife event quest giver.
